roleset.name: remove by rubbing

example.name: Example without instrument
example.text: Please [PRO] efface the formula from the blackboard.

example.name: Example with instrument
example.text: John effaced the smudges with glass cleaner and a rag.
example.arg: with glass cleaner and a rag.

roleset.note: EFFACE-V NOTES: Created based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Vn class destroy-44. No framenet entry. Framed by Katie. (from efface.01-v)

roleset.name: remove from awareness

example.name: Transative example
example.text: Eli tried [PRO] to efface the memory of his time in the camps.
example.arg: the memory of his time in the camps.

example.name: Another trasative example
example.text: It was a transition so violent [time*] was powerless [* t]to efface it.

roleset.note: EFFACE-V NOTES: Created based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No vn of fn mappings. Framed by Katie. (from efface.02-v)

roleset.name: make inconspicuous

example.name: Transative example
example.text: Anna deliberately effaced herself and played to the dramatic Molly.

example.name: Another transative example
example.text: Her sister, however, was unable [PRO] to efface her beauty.
